channel.title: A cool game!
channel.description: well i got this in an email yesterday and its pretty fun just kinda weird how they get it right every time, and i cant seem to figure out how they do it? you will know what im talking about when you try it. just post what you think and how you think they do it. [url=http://www.milaadesign.com/wizardy.html]http://www.milaadesign.com/wizardy.html[/url]

item.title: A cool game!
item.dc:creator: @puj puj
item.description:
@puj wrote:

I have worked out how it works, for any two digit number the two digits added together subtracted from the original number makes a multiple of 9. and on the board they show you at the end of the game all of the multiples of 9 all have the same symbol .

They fool us by changing the symbol for the multiples of 9 every time.

The numbers 9,18,27,36,45,54,63,72,81,90 alwasy have the same symbol.

Read full topic

item.title: A cool game!
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

mjordan:

so it worked for you un-named? im telling you 2 that it didnt work for just red the directions more carefully and do what i said and it works. and yeah there are alot of the same symbols still cant figure how it works exactly

No, my theroy is it’s purely based on luck, I mean like they have a 1/10 chance of guessing it’s right. Example : 54, 5 + 4 = 9, 54 - 9 = 45, 45 = a multiple of 9, all it has to do is chose the multiple of 9 symbol and it works, so if there’s 100 numbers, and 10 symboles for each 10 multiplyers, it has a 1/10 chance of guessing your answer. It hasn’t worked for me, twice, so I think it’s just luck.

Read full topic

item.title: A cool game!
item.dc:creator: @mjordan mjordan
item.description:
@mjordan wrote:

ummm yes it does work. you arent doing it right. i guarantee you are adding the the 3 that you pick together say for example you pick 22 you are doing 22+22. NO you are supposed to add the two DIGITS together 2+2 then subtract from the original number, in this case 22. now try it and read the directions more carefully

Read full topic
